Title: Relates to including statistics on childbirth complications, fetal loss, and other injuries in information for maternity patients
Summary: Includes statistics on childbirth complications, fetal losses, other injuries and other maternity outcomes in information for maternity patients.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803-j, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to including statistics on childbirth complications, fetal losses, and other injuries in information leaflets for maternity patients
